name: @allthingsclaude/blueprints
description: Claude Code commands and agents for enhanced AI-assisted development workflows

scripts.prepublishOnly: pnpm run build && pnpm run test
scripts.release:beta: pnpm run build && pnpm run test && npm version prerelease --preid beta && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:beta:patch: pnpm run build && pnpm run test && npm version prepatch --preid beta && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:beta:minor: pnpm run build && pnpm run test && npm version preminor --preid beta && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:beta:major: pnpm run build && pnpm run test && npm version premajor --preid beta && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:patch: pnpm run build && pnpm run test && npm version patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: pnpm run build && pnpm run test && npm version minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: pnpm run build && pnpm run test && npm version major && git push && git push --tags

author: Marko Radak (https://github.com/markoradak)
